title: Roasted red pepper and artichoke salad
description: This simple salad allows the wonderful flavours of roasted peppers and artichokes to shine through. Perfect served with couscous on the side.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz roasted red peppers in oil, drained and sliced
175g/6oz chargrilled artichoke hearts in oil, drained and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
